name: Tuk Tuk Racing fever
description:
******FREE###FREEE###FREEE*******
******FOR LIMITED TIME ONLY*******

Tuk Tuk Racing fever is one of the most addictive 3D racing game!

The aim in Tuk Tuk Racing fever is to finish the mission as fast as possible. See how quickly you can do it and perform some fantastic stunts on the way!

You must use all of your Racing and dodging skills in Tuk Tuk Racing fever to reach the end of the Race . You’ll need quick reactions and nifty fingers, as there are many opposition players trying to take you down.Think you can dodge your way to the End Zone? Good,Fasten your seat belt, and let’s get running!
